translations.homeThankYouFooter: Thank you for using the app :3
translations.settingsCommandHintDescription:
Enter the command/program to use for changing your wallpaper.

Ensure you include the $VP placeholder, which will be replaced with the actual video path when you select a thumbnail.

Example command: /usr/bin/wallpaper $VP
translations.settingsDarkModeShortDescription: Why would you turn this off?
translations.settingsDarkModeHintDescription: It's Dark Mode. You know what it does. Why are you even reading this? Just toggle it and embrace the darkness... or the light, if you're into that.
translations.settingsNewWallpapersShortDescription: Search for new wallpapers at startup
translations.settingsNewWallpapersHintDescription: Enable this option to automatically search for and load new wallpapers from the selected folder. If disabled, the app will load faster because it wonâ€™t spend time searching for new files and generating new thumbnails.
translations.settingsClearThumbnailsHintDescription:
This will delete all generated thumbnails, usually located at "/home/$USER/.local/share/wallpaper_picker/".

Use this if you have thumbnails that no longer match any videos.

Note: Thumbnails will need to be regenerated after clearing.
translations.settingsDeleteConfigHintDescription:
This will delete the configuration file, usually located at "/home/$USER/.config/wallpaper_picker".

Use this to reset all settings to their default values.
translations.settingsLanguageHintDescription:
Select your preferred language from the list.

Don't see yours? Help translate it into your language! Visit the project on GitHub
